title: ESA budget dips slightly in 2025
summary:

title: Hubble Rings In the New Year
summary: This NASA/ESA Hubble Space Telescope image reveals a tiny patch of sky in the constellation Hydra. The stars and galaxies depicted here span a mind-bending range of distances. The objects in this image that are nearest to us are stars within our own Milky Way galaxy. You can easily spot these stars by their diffraction […]

title: Testing of Key Ariane 6 Upgrade to Begin in March
summary:
The European Space Agency and industry partner Avio will begin testing the P160 solid-fuel booster in March 2025. The booster will replace the current P120 booster and will be a key element in enabling Arianespace to deliver on an 18-launch contract for Amazon. Amazon awarded the largest launch deal ever in April 2022, securing 83 […]

title: Live coverage: SpaceX to launch 21 Starlink satellites on Falcon 9 rocket from Cape Canaveral
summary: The launch includes 13 Starlink V2 Mini satellites that have Direct to Cell capabilities. Liftoff from pad 40 at Cape Canaveral Space Force Station is set for 11:21 a.m. EST (1621 UTC).

title: NASA Jet Propulsion Laboratory evacuated due to LA wildfire
summary:
The NASA Jet Propulsion Laboratory has been closed down and evacuated as the Eaton Fire continues to burn, at its closest, less than one mile away from the facility.
